Description: Gold finger-ring; oval box-setting containing a convex almandine intaglio: wolf standing to left.
Bibliographic references: Finger Ring / Catalogue of the Finger Rings, Greek, Etruscan, and Roman, in the Departments of Antiquities, British Museum (563)
Gem / Catalogue of Engraved Gems & Cameos, Greek, Etruscan & Roman in the British Museum (2338)
Acquisition name: Bequeathed by: Sir Augustus Wollaston Franks
Previous owner: Previous owner/ex-collection: Rev Greville John Chester
